actions.description: A ref with imperative actions that can be performed on the menu.

onItemsChange.description: Function called when the items displayed in the menu change.

slotProps.description: The props used for each slot inside the Menu.

slots.description: The components used for each slot inside the Menu. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.

root.description: Class name applied to the root element.

slotDescriptions.root: The component that renders the popup element.
slotDescriptions.listbox: The component that renders the listbox.
